title: Nectar
summaries: The Nectar is a pre-Hardmode pet-summoning item that summons a Baby Hornet pet that follows the player around. This pet will not teleport to the player when it is far away. The Nectar is dropped by Queen Bee with a 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) / 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance.

statistics.Sell: 3 GC
